title: Herbert Henrique
description: Herbert Henrique, Software Engineer and Frontend lead

home.title: herbert henrique
home.description: I try to write code for humans for more than 10 years now. Everyday, in some way, I'm helping people and solving problems. That's why I work as Software Engineer and Frontend Lead at SumUp,  empowering small businesses across the world . Also, I love  JS, FP and terrible jokes
